title: Immersive Virtual Reality (IVR) Utilization Strategies for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and proficiency in general digital tools
context.additional_context: A process where current practitioners experience science concepts and enhance problem-solving skills using IVR (Immersive Virtual Reality) technology

learning_goals: Learners can observe and analyze complex scientific phenomena without physical constraints in Immersive Virtual Reality (IVR) environments
Learners can reproduce actual science lab procedures step-by-step and correct errors through IVR simulations
Learners derive scientific problem-solving solutions through peer interaction while performing collaborative IVR tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
